net.sf.tweety.arg.deductive

Class DeductiveKnowledgeBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.tweety.commons.BeliefSet<net.sf.tweety.logics.pl.syntax.PropositionalFormula>
      • net.sf.tweety.logics.pl.PlBeliefSet
        • net.sf.tweety.arg.deductive.DeductiveKnowledgeBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<net.sf.tweety.logics.pl.syntax.PropositionalFormula>, Collection<net.sf.tweety.logics.pl.syntax.PropositionalFormula>, net.sf.tweety.commons.BeliefBase

    public class DeductiveKnowledgeBase
extends net.sf.tweety.logics.pl.PlBeliefSet
    Instances of this class represent deductive knowledge bases, i.e. sets of propositional formulas.
    Author:
    Matthias Thimm

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      DeductiveKnowledgeBase()
      Creates a new (empty) knowledge base.

      Creates a new knowledge base with the given set of formulas.
